Rick Maneval

[City Council](https://www.fatetx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=16)  
Title: Councilmember Place 4

### Address

1. 1900 CD Boren Parkway
2. Fate TX 75087
3. Phone: [972-771-4601](tel:9727714601)
4. City Hall Hours:
5. 7:30am to 5:30pm
6. Friday: 8:00am to 12:00pm

### Contact Us

1. **Police and Fire Department**
2. Non-Emergency: [972-204-7001](tel:9722047001)Option 5
3. Animal Services - All American Dogs:  
   972-382-3647
4. **Community Services**
5. Non-Emergency: [469-560-5911](tel:4695605911)
6. **Water/Wastewater**
7. Non-Emergency: [972-771-4601](tel:9727714601) X 143
8. After-Hours Emergencies: [972-824-4403](tel:9728244403)

/QuickLinks.aspx

1. City Tax Rate:
   ==============

   THE CITY OF FATE ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR’S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY 3.4 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $6.61.
